name: paginator-builder
description: Calculate pagination array for easier building of pagination markup.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/pagination-builder.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/pagination-builder.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.precommit: git diff-index --cached HEAD --name-only --diff-filter ACMR | grep -E "\.jsx?$" | xargs ./node_modules/.bin/eslint

author: Pavel Grinchenko
